Advanced data
Item ID25316

Goblin decorations is a holiday reward received from completing a Christmas event from 2020 onwards. The item is used on furniture that can be built in the pool, fireplace, curtains, and spirit tree spaces within a player-owned house.

This item can be stored in the toy box space of a costume room.

If lost, or if not received due to completing the Christmas event as a free-to-play player, the item can be reclaimed from Diango in Draynor Village.

[[File:Goblin decorations detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Goblin decorations''' is a holiday reward received from completing a [[Christmas event]] from 2020 onwards. The item is used on furniture that can be built in the [[Pool space|pool]], [[Fireplace space|fireplace]], [[Curtain space|curtains]], and [[Spirit tree (Construction)|spirit tree]] spaces within a [[player-owned house]].

{{Costume storage|toy box space}}

If lost, or if not received due to completing the Christmas event as a [[free-to-play]] player, the item can be reclaimed from [[Diango]] in [[Draynor Village]].
